ovdesc.p: This is used to set the parameter that need to be used during Account Closure.
This parameter table will hold the parameters to be used during ACCOUNT.CLOSURE and AC.PRE.CLOSURE.DETAILS.
The parameter can be set at various levels like SYSTEM, Lead Company ID or Company Mnemonic, Category, Category*Lead Company Code.

desc.p: This field will hold the description of the Account Closure Parameter.
Mandatory Field.
This is a multi-value field to hold the Application Name.
Valid Record in PGM.FILE.
Currently only the value 'LIMIT' is allowed.
This is a multi-value field to hold the Local Application Name that needs to be checked during account closure.
Valid Record in PGM.FILE.
This is a multi-value field to hold the Local Application API Name that needs to be checked during account closure.
Valid Record in EB.API
This is a multi-value field reserved for Future use.
No Input Field
Payment Order Product which needs to be specified for Account closures using PAYMENT as the close mode, for account transfers.Should be a valid record in payment order product
System will pick the parameters maintained in this PO product while raising the PO transaction.

p.p: Validation Rules: Should be allowed for input only if PI module is installed
PO product specifed here needs to be Account Transfer type - The field "Pay through Beneficiary" in the Payment Order Product application should be set to NO
